about.companyDesc: PT Cipta Metalindo Persada is a leading Indonesian manufacturer specializing in high-quality metal components for the automotive, household, and industrial sectors. With over 28 years of experience, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner for major brands across Southeast Asia. Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities, combined with rigorous quality control processes, ensure that every product meets international standards.
about.companyDesc2: We are committed to innovation, sustainability, and delivering exceptional value to our clients. Our team of skilled engineers and technicians works tirelessly to push the boundaries of metal manufacturing technology.
about.visionDesc: To become the most trusted and innovative metal component manufacturer in Southeast Asia, setting the standard for quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.
about.mission1: Deliver premium quality metal components that exceed customer expectations
about.mission2: Invest continuously in advanced manufacturing technology and processes
about.mission3: Foster a culture of innovation, safety, and environmental responsibility
about.mission4: Build lasting partnerships with clients through reliability and excellence
about.timeline1Desc: PT Cipta Metalindo Persada was established in Jakarta with a small workshop and a vision for manufacturing excellence.
about.timeline2Desc: Secured our first major automotive parts contract, marking the beginning of rapid growth in the industry.
about.timeline3Desc: Achieved ISO 9001:2008 certification, demonstrating our commitment to international quality standards.
about.timeline4Desc: Opened our second manufacturing facility with advanced CNC machinery and automated production lines.
about.timeline5Desc: Expanded operations to serve international markets across Southeast Asia, Australia, and Europe.
about.timeline6Desc: Implemented smart manufacturing systems with IoT integration and real-time production monitoring.
